## **Description**
The **Now **operator allows to return the current date and time.

## **Input**
**Input**

**Data type**

**Description**

**in0**

Any

The input data to use to produce the current date and time

## **Output**
**Output**

**Data type**

**Description**

**out0**

Date

The current date and time

## **Settings**
## **![](data:image/png;base64,)**
- Select the **Date/Time **option to manually define the format of the date that the operator will return, and then select the required format from the drop-down menu.

> Tip

Click![](data:image/png;base64,) (**Add item**) at the bottom of the drop-down menu to add a custom value to the list, then click ![](data:image/png;base64,) to confirm.

![](data:image/png;base64,)

- Select the **TimeStamp **option if you want the operator to return the numeric value of the date, expressed in milliseconds.

- Click **Apply **to confirm.

## **Special cases**
In special cases, the operator behaves as follows:

**Case**

**Behavior**

**NULL input (no input)**

The operator does not consider a NULL input. The system logs a warning event.
